name: Emergency Rescue: Fire Fighters
description:
Above And Beyond The Call Of Duty

Heroes and heroines surround us. They are neighbors, friends and strangers we pass on the streets, who have saved our loved ones, homes and pets, all in the line of duty. This is your chance to see the world from their perspective, faced with the same life-threatening emergency rescues that confront them everyday.

Pit your skills against one of nature's deadliest forces, on a mission to outwit the devious enemy of fire. Command the rescue scene, controlling the strategy and action of an entire unit of personnel. Deploy your limited resources aggressively, but not recklessly, and subdue the deadly threat, bringing the crisis to a successful resolution.

Features:
- Pit your skills against one of nature's most hostile forces
- Fight fires indoors on multiple floors or outdoors in traffic accidents, at parks and more
- Direct the deployment and tactics of your resources at the scene of the crisis
- Control the strategy and action of the entire unit of rescue personnel
- The most obvious move may not be the best move - carefully analyze your strategy
- It's a race against time and injury
- View TV news reports of your completed missions
- Receive thank-you notes and other e-mails from the rescued citizens and their families
- Manage your personnel's health and water supply wisely as you calculate your strategy
- Complete 23 unique missions including three training missions
- Deploy personnel to fight the fire in multiple locations within one site
